solution_line_template: She used {clothes_fraction} x ${initial_money} = $<<{clothes_fraction}*{initial_money}={money_for_clothes}>>{money_for_clothes} to buy clothes.
She gave {charity_fraction} x ${initial_money} = $<<{charity_fraction}*{initial_money}={money_to_charity}>>{money_to_charity} to a charity.
Thus, she spent a total of ${money_to_mom} + ${money_for_clothes} + ${money_to_charity} = $<<{money_to_mom}+{money_for_clothes}+{money_to_charity}={total_spent}>>{total_spent}.
